snippet: When Tim Kaine, Democrat of Virginia, spoke entirely in Spanish on the Senate floor in support of the immigration bill, he was the first senator to do so, according to records from the Senate Library.
abstract: Sen Tim Kaine, Democrat of Virgina, makes speech entirely in Spanish on Senate floor in support of immigration bill; records from Senate library indicate that Kaine was first senator to give speech all in Spanish from Senate floor.
lead_paragraph: When Tim Kaine, Democrat of Virginia, spoke entirely in Spanish on the Senate floor in support of the immigration bill, he was the first senator to do so, according to records from the Senate Library.

headline.seo: Tim Kaine’s Immigration Speech in Spanish Is a First for the Senate
headline.main: A Speech in Spanish Is a First for the Senate
headline.print_headline: A Speech in Spanish, A First for the Senate
